incident_updates.body:
We are currently experiencing an incident impacting our Virtual Private Servers offer.											
							
Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. 
As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.
							
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Backup Managed Maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our infrastructure. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 20/01/2025 08:00 UTC End time : 24/01/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : Backup and restoration will be unavailable during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our team will carry out maintenance on the Veeam Backup Managed service. Thank you for your understanding.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - VMware vCenter Server maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 20/01/2025 08:00 UTC End time : 24/01/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : Management will be temporarily unavailable for 1h30 during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vCenter Server services. An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins. Thank you for your understanding.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Host replacement maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 15/01/2025 08:00 UTC End time : 16/01/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : Concerned hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will be replacing Hosted Private Cloud's hosts by new ones. Concerned customers will receive a notification regarding the replacement of their host(s). Thank you for your understanding.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VMware offer. Start time : 06/01/2025 08:00 UTC End time : 15/01/2025 17:00 UTC Service impact : vMotion will be temporarily unavailable for 20 minutes during the operation. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts. An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins. Thank you for your understanding.
